strapi-llm-translator.button.tooltip.dis: Translation is only available for localized content types
strapi-llm-translator.button.tooltip.err: Translation failed. Click to try again
strapi-llm-translator.plugin.name: LLM Translator
strapi-llm-translator.plugin.page.descri: Configure the LLM Translator plugin settings. Be aware that Base Model, API Key and LLM Base URL need to be set as environment variables.
strapi-llm-translator.plugin.page.form.l: Base URL for the LLM API. It needs to be set as an environment variable.
Model that will be used to generate the translations. It needs to be set as an environment variable.
A higher value will make the output more random, while a lower value will make it more focused and deterministic.
strapi-llm-translator.plugin.page.form.s: This is (part) of the prompt that will be used to instruct the LLM. It should be clear and concise.
strapi-llm-translator.plugin.page.title: LLM Translator (Configuration)
